title: 新人报道~~~~
author: suwako诹访子
txt_content:
{:10_515:}[monster_spawner][minecart_track1][minecart_track1][wood_sword]我来报道了~~[wood_axe][wood_pickaxe][gold_pickaxe][leather_leggings][leather_helmet][gold_leggings][chain_leggings][gold_chestplate][chain_boots][minecart][minecart_track][minecart_track1][iron_chestplate]
有点感觉我在作死呢~~~~~~~~~~~~：有同感
不管啦，报道~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~·

replies.author: 苤二铭
replies.txt_content: 听说“不作死就不会死”已经录入新版英语词典

replies.author: kivv
replies.txt_content: 已经没人气给你大礼包了

replies.author: idiotorange
replies.txt_content: 不过头像的青蛙子皮肤不错啊

replies.author: 灬龍ゑ殇灬
replies.txt_content: 你猜对了 你就是在作死  没错 嘎嘎嘎

replies.author: suwako诹访子
replies.txt_content:
pumpkin_ng 发表于 2014-10-26 10:14
LZ你就是在作死
嗯，我就是在作死，虽然我也不想呀~~~~~~~~~~~
QAQ~~~随风飘动的泪
